projects.projectDescription: The Mineral Particle Analysis System uses automated image processing to calculate particle size, shape, and spatial distribution.
projectInfo: Automates the detection of mineral particle boundaries in high-resolution digital imagery.
Calculates geometric metrics including surface area, perimeter, and centroid location.
Implements background removal using Rembg for enhanced sample isolation.
Generates smallest encapsulating circles to evaluate particle size distribution.

projects.projectDescription: PasterBot is a GUI Tool that allows users to paste content in text fields where pasting is disabled, and can automate text input on their computer
projectInfo: Simulates human typing behavior to bypass clipboard restrictions in restricted text fields.
Integrated Auto-Type feature for rapid sequential text input automation.
Clipboard management via pyperclip to capture and inject transitionary data.
Provides pre-built boilerplate templates for repetitive coding structures.

projects.projectDescription: This project contains a simple implementation of a bigram language model using PyTorch. The model learns to predict the next character in a sequence based on the preceding character.
projectInfo: Implements a character-level predictive language model built from scratch using PyTorch.
Features a Transformer-based architecture with multi-head self-attention mechanisms.
Includes a comprehensive training and evaluation pipeline for performance monitoring.
Capable of autonomous text generation based on learned character sequences.

projects.projectDescription: This is a bookmarker app, where you can store links that you find on the internet
projectInfo: Secure full-stack link management application with user authentication.
Categorization system using dynamic tags for efficient content organization.
Built-in search functionality for quick retrieval of saved resources.
Integrated account management system for personalized user experience.

projects.projectDescription: This project focuses on using CNN & RNN ML and Deep Learning techniques to automatically categorize breast tissue samples as either malignant or benign
projects.projectTechStack: CNN, RNN, Machine Learning, Deep Learning
projectInfo: Automates the categorization of breast tissue samples as malignant or benign.
Leverages CNN and RNN architectures for high-precision diagnostic analysis.
Processes large-scale histopathology datasets for medical pattern recognition.
Integrates deep learning techniques to enhance diagnostic accuracy in oncology.

projects.projectDescription: Restaurant-Landing-Page is a responsive single-page template built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that showcases a restaurantâ€™s brand, menu highlights, and gallery.
projectInfo: Responsive single-page design optimized for modern browsers and mobile devices.
Features dedicated sections for brand storytelling, menu highlights, and gallery.
Implemented with semantic HTML5 and modular CSS for scalability.
Clean and minimalist UI design to enhance the restaurant's digital presence.

projects.projectDescription: Check out the source code for this Website that you have visited!
projectInfo: Personal developer portfolio showcasing professional projects and technical expertise.
Modern UI/UX design featuring glassmorphism effects and smooth transitions.
Integrated contact system and downloadable resume functionality.
Highly responsive layout built with React and optimized with Vite.
